name: Miracle
headline: Accelerate clinical trials with actionable insights from your data
description:
Miracle puts Clinical Operations in control. 

For biotech/pharma companies, Miracle is the "control room" for clinical trial management. Miracle helps save time by integrating vendor reports and trial data sources (i.e. EDC, IRT, study website) into a unified, real-time portal with actionable insights. Today, Miracle is powering a number of clinical trials around the world.

founders.name: Jin Kim, Founder
founders.description: Founder & CEO of Miracle | Former US Archery Team | MIT

Backed by
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b91e61ab255e62eb1b2250/65b9505330d5538b9868b6bf_YC%20Logo%20Expanded%20%E2%80%94%20Black.svg)
# ClinOps in Control
Miracle is your unified dashboard to uncover bottlenecks in real-time and finish clinical trials faster.
[Get Started ->](http://www.miracleml.com/</contact>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b91e61ab255e62eb1b2250/65baca45745c35cca04bbc16_hero.png)
TESTIMONIALS
### **NASDAQ: MLYS**
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b91e61ab255e62eb1b2250/667748fada9aa6ed4fee37df_MIN_logo_primary_fullcolor_rgb.png)
"Mineralys had an urgent need for a platform to take in real-time clinical trial analytics, study site level output, aggregate recruitment, performance metrics and models. Within a week, Miracle had us up and running. Within a month, we could identify opportunities to improve site performance, and in less than three months, we were seeing an impact on our performance goals."
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b91e61ab255e62eb1b2250/66774b0c6b3b946177a118e0_david-rodman.png)
##### David Rodman
Chief Medical OfficerMineralys Therapeutics
### **NASDAQ: IKT**
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b91e61ab255e62eb1b2250/65b9838f0102fbeeae57d10d_inhibikase.png)
"The Miracle platform has been a game changer for Inhibikase Therapeutics. Beyond streamlining our recruitment information flow, which significantly reduced the time from participant inquiry to contact, we've expanded its utility to encompass drug supply monitoring and data quality review in a continuous manner. Having all this information in Miracle as a control room has not only enhanced our operational efficiency but has also injected more transparency into our clinical trial management process."
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b91e61ab255e62eb1b2250/65b983a8eb576e2fb29589ba_chris-meyer.png)
##### Chris Meyer
Vice President, Clinical OperationsInhibikase Therapeutics
### 3 months
Runway Saved
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b91e61ab255e62eb1b2250/65b9718d2874a6fe7015a86c_axial.png)
"Miracle shined a giant light on the black box of clinical trial recruitment. Their customized real-time dashboard not only added transparency but also allowed us to understand where our recruitment efforts were effective and where they weren't, all without having to maintain traditional spreadsheet trackers combining data from our study website, EDC, and recruitment vendors. This level of visibility allowed our team to make rapid adjustments and achieve database lock three months ahead of schedule, effectively giving us back an additional quarter of runway."
![Photo of Gabriel Belfort, MD, PhD](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b91e61ab255e62eb1b2250/65e24301821fcb6efdba7139_1700500170939.jpeg)
##### Stewart Campbell
Chief Executive Officer‍Axial Therapeutics
1
2
3
Value
## Stop wasting time on spreadsheets, take action with **real-time** insights.
### Real-time transparency for actionable insights
Miracle integrates with your key study platforms and datasets in a vendor agnostic manner for real-time transparency:
  * Electronic Data Capture (EDC)
  * Drug supply (i.e. IRT, RTSM)
  * Lab systems (central/local)
  * PV/Safety Database (AE/SAE)
  * Vendor reports (CRO, data management, recruitment)
  * Study website & referrals


![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b91e61ab255e62eb1b2250/66300db1dc7c6cf831f48974_miracle-integrations.png)
### Enrollment projections for scenario planning 
Miracle measures each site's performance to project enrollment timelines and simulate scenarios for adding or closing sites.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b91e61ab255e62eb1b2250/662fc57e74861641e9762973_enrollment-projection.png)
### Continuous data cleaning and review
Miracle empowers your team to conduct data cleaning in an ongoing fashion to optimize data quality and save time in data cleaning.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b91e61ab255e62eb1b2250/662f0878beab55128d519848_data-cleaning.png)
### Safety monitoring
Miracle breaks down adverse events by site, by seriousness, over time, and in the context of your trial subject's medical history, concomitant medication, and use of investigational product.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b91e61ab255e62eb1b2250/66302b9f0646eff75e0824e0_safety-monitoring.png)
### Patient profiles & medical monitoring
Miracle integrates all relevant data from your EDC, PV safety database, and lab systems to show patient profiles in a single portal.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b91e61ab255e62eb1b2250/662fc910c3736849802a7112_patient-profiles.png)
Integrations
## Our growing suite of integrations gets you started in just days
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b91e61ab255e62eb1b2250/65b9cbbdca197f45ab21af5c_medidata.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b91e61ab255e62eb1b2250/677a2d3ae7a8f7ec318b51da_zelta.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b91e61ab255e62eb1b2250/677a2b65af27bc8264de583b_suvoda.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b91e61ab255e62eb1b2250/677a2acfe7a8f7ec318a6648_ppd.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b91e61ab255e62eb1b2250/65b9cd4031be3ce898baf2cd_smartsheet.png)
## ... and more!
Core Features
## How **Miracle** Works
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b91e61ab255e62eb1b2250/65b91e61ab255e62eb1b232c_Icon1.svg)
##### Data integration & aggregation
Miracle has ready connectors to clinical trial platforms (i.e. EDC, RTSM/IRT, lab systems, study website) and your key datasets to integrate into our secure, automated platform.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b91e61ab255e62eb1b2250/65b9bab72bba23d7bfbe468c_chart-pie-slice.svg)
##### Interactive, unified dashboard
Miracle can automate metrics from your manual spreadsheet trackers and empower your team to interact with visualizations, from showing high level overviews to drilling into granular site-level and patient-level details.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b91e61ab255e62eb1b2250/65b9baf22bba23d7bfbe6fa8_magic-wand.svg)
##### AI forecast using real-time data
Miracle becomes the single dashboard unifying data from across your clinical trial(s). Having data centralized is key to leveraging AI, and Miracle enables you to consolidate your data in a vendor-agnostic fashion.
# **Latest** Miracle News
Featuring a collection of articles published by the Miracle team

[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b91e61ab255e62eb1b22a8/66d0ea6ea67fec00a4214e4f_Blog%20Thumbnail%20Image.png)ResourcesOptimizing Study Enrollment Closeout in Clinical Trials: Minimizing Overshoot and DelaysOptimize enrollment closeout with data-driven strategies to minimize overshoot, reduce costs, and keep clinical trial timelines on track.![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b91e61ab255e62eb1b22a8/65be912777a6b18b990e5a98_DA15F470-7CDE-43FA-BE24-81F88DB119C9_1_105_c.jpeg)Jin KimSeptember 3, 2024•5min read](http://www.miracleml.com/</blog/optimizing-study-enrollment-closeout-in-biotech-minimizing-overshoot-and-delays>)

Security
## Security is our top priority.
## Miracle adheres to rigorous data security and compliance, including SOC II, HIPAA, and GDPR.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b91e61ab255e62eb1b2250/66043e1eb72f6f8bb53a1502_21972-312_SOC_NonCPA.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b91e61ab255e62eb1b2250/6601ef222b65541ba514c505_Vanta_Compliance_HIPAA.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b91e61ab255e62eb1b2250/6601ef25a6640050814c5a6c_Vanta_Compliance_GDPR.svg)
[Learn More ->](http://www.miracleml.com/</security>)

generated_description:
**Company Summary: Miracle**

- **Founded**: 2022
- **Location**: San Francisco, CA
- **Team Size**: 3 employees
- **Backed by**: Y Combinator (Batch W23)

**Mission**: 
Miracle's mission is centered around revolutionizing clinical trial management for biotech and pharmaceutical companies. They aim to accelerate clinical trials through actionable insights derived from real-time data.

**What They Do**: 
Imagine a control room for clinical operations — that’s Miracle. They provide a unified dashboard that integrates vendor reports and trial data sources such as EDC (Electronic Data Capture), IRT (Interactive Response Technology), and study websites, streamlining the often chaotic and fragmented world of clinical trials. This integration results in real-time insights, helping trial managers uncover bottlenecks and optimize their processes, ultimately saving time and improving outcomes.

Here’s a fun fact: Miracle has already made waves in the biotech ecosystem, with testimonials from notable clients like Mineralys and Inhibikase Therapeutics who have experienced significant improvements in trial transparency and efficiency.

**Key Features**:
1. **Data Integration**: Connects with a variety of clinical trial platforms, offering seamless data aggregation.
2. **Real-Time Insights**: Provides an interactive dashboard that replaces tedious spreadsheets, enabling teams to visualize metrics from high-level overviews to detailed site-level data.
3. **Continuous Data Cleaning**: Helps maintain data integrity by allowing ongoing reviews and updates.
4. **Safety Monitoring**: Tracks adverse events contextualized against trial subjects' medical histories.
5. **Patient Profiles**: Integrates relevant data into a single portal for streamlined medical monitoring.

**Use Cases**: 
Miracle is already helping organizations cut down on delays significantly. For example, Axial Therapeutics used Miracle’s platform to achieve database lock a full quarter earlier than planned!

**Tags**: SaaS, B2B, Biotech, Healthcare, San Francisco Bay Area.

**Website**: [Miracle](http://www.miracleml.com)

In summary, if you're in the biotech or pharma space and find yourself drowning in data chaos during clinical trials, Miracle could be the lifeboat you need to navigate towards greater efficiency and success.
